arm_group.description: In the metformin group metformin was initiated at a dose of 500 mg once per day and increased by 500 mg every 3 days up to 1000 mg BID per os.

In the metformin group metformin was initiated at a dose of 500 mg once per day and increased by 500 mg every 3 days up to 1000 mg BID per os. At the same time roflumilast was initiated at a dose of 500 mg BID per os.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study was to determine whether combined treatment with
      phosphodiesterase-4 (PDE-4) inhibitor roflumilast and metformin is more effective than
      metformin as monotherapy in the treatment of obese women with polycystic ovary syndrome
      (PCOS) who had been previously poor responders regarding weight reduction on metformin
      monotherapy. The investigators anticipated greater changes in body weight in patients on
      combined treatment than in those on monotherapy with metformin.

clinical_study.brief_title: PDE-4 Inhibitor Roflumilast and Polycystic Ovary Syndrome

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  18 years old to menopause

          -  polycystic ovary syndrome (NICHD criteria)

          -  BMI of 30 kg/m² or higher

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  depression

          -  type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus

          -  history of carcinoma

          -  Cushing's syndrome or congenital (non-classic) adrenal hyperplasia

          -  significant cardiovascular, kidney or hepatic disease

          -  the use of medications other than metformin known or suspected to affect reproductive
             or metabolic functions

          -  the use of statins, within 90 days prior to study entry

intervention.other_name: Glucophage tablets and Daxas 500 micrograms film-coated tablets

clinical_study.official_title: Combined Treatment With PDE-4 Inhibitor Roflumilast and Metformin Leads to Significant Weight Loss in Obese Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Concentrations of fasting glucose was measured in mmol/L.
other_outcome.measure: The other outcomes was changes in fasting concentrations of glucose.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Fasting concentrations of insulin was measured in mU/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in fasting concentration of insulin.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Concentration of LH was measured in U/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in blood concentrations of LH (luteinizing hormone).
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Blood concentrations of FSH was measured in U/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in blood concentrations of FSH (follicle-stimulating hormone).
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Blood concentration was measured in nmol/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in blood concentration of testosterone.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Blood concentrations of androstenedione was measured in nmol/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in blood concentration in androstenedione.
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Blood concentrations of SHBG was measured in nmol/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in blood concentrations of SHBG (sex hormone-binding globulin).
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

other_outcome.description: Patient's blood was drawn between 8 and 9 a.m. Blood concentrations of DHEAS was measured in micromol/L.
other_outcome.measure: Other outcome was change in blood concentration of DHEAS (dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate).
other_outcome.time_frame: Patient's fasting blood was drawn at the base point and at the endpoint of 12 weeks of clinical trial.

primary_outcome.description: The patient's body weight was measured in kilograms.
primary_outcome.measure: The main outcome was change in body weight.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's body weight was mesured at the base point and every four weeks during 12 weeks of clinical trial.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Patient's BMI was defined as the patient's body mass in kilograms divided by the square of their height in meters.
secondary_outcome.measure: The secondary outcome was change in body mass index (BMI).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's body weight were measured at the basepoint and every four weeks during the 12 weeks of clinical trial. Patient's height was measured at the basepoint.

secondary_outcome.description: Patient's waist circumference was measured in centimeters.
secondary_outcome.measure: The secondary outcome was change in waist circumference.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patient's waist circumference was measured at the basepoint and every four weeks during 12 weeks of clinical trial.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
